content.rendered:
Directed by Naman Nitin Mukesh

Written by Neil Nitin Mukesh

Cast Neil Nitin Mukesh (Vikram Kapoor). Adah Sharma (Radhika Nair). Gul Panag(Romila Kapoor). Taher Shabbir (Jimmy brigenza). Shama Sikander (Sarah brigenza). Manish Chaudhari (Inspector Himanshu Roy (as Manish Chaudhary)). Rajit Kapoor (Pratap Kapoor) . Mukesh S. Bhatt (Kaka (as Mukesh Bhatt)). Peter Errol (Raayo). Hrasif (Veer). Bikramjeet Kanwarpal (Dr. Kamlesh). Yogendra Kumeria (Vikram kapoor’s father).Chandramogli Madem. Pahal Mange (Nandini). Mayank Kumar Mishra (Priyam). Vinni Mobstaz (Suspense). Sudhanshu Pandey (Narang). Varun Singh Rajput (Detective). Bhavana Rao (Sonia). Ram Sujan Singh (Constable Pandey). Chahat Suryavanshi

Languages Hindi

Producers Shambhu Aryal. Vinay Chuakar. Sonal Deshpande. Suman Kumar. Sanjay Mehta. Neil Nitin Mukesh. Madan Paliwal. Shantanu Tungare

Production Miraj Flim Creation. Music-HrProductio. NNM Film
